name: One Room VR - Yui Edition
description:
Yui Hanasaka, the most popular character in One Room’s first anime season, comes to your apartment and asks YOU to tutor her!

*Official Anime VR App Yui Hanasaka (VA: M・A・O)*
A VR app that allows you to spend happy time alone with a gorgeous girl!
All you need is your smartphone to use position and hand tracking!

*Icha Icha Mode
1) View a life-sized Yui from all 360 degrees!
2) Three or Four scenes with three different poses are recorded!

*Lap Pillow Mode, Sleeping Together Mode
1) Yui will let you use her lap as a pillow or sleep with her!
2) Lap Pillow Mode has four different scenes and Sleeping Together Mode has three!
3) All dialogue and voice recordings are brand new!

***How to Enjoy the App (by Smartphone Type)***
[iPhone 6s or later and less than iOS 11 (unable to use ARKit)]
When playing in Icha Icha Mode, bring your face closer to the screen and the movement will be replicated in the app!
If you use VR goggles that are compatible with Samukon MOVE, you can tap the screen to interact with items, and walk around your apartment using Sakumon MOVE’s Teleport function.

*When using VR goggles that are not Samukon MOVE compatible, moving around the apartment will happen with a predetermined warp. You will also not be able to “touch” as much.
*Please take a look at the recommended VR goggles on Gugenka’s official website.

[iPhone 7 or later models]
In addition to the functions listed above, you can also pay a small fee and unlock hand tracking in the app!
Your own hand will appear within the VR app and your movements will be reflected there.

[Models that cannot use ARKit (iPhone 6 / iPhone 6 Plus / iPhone 5s / iPhone SE)]
When playing with Samukon compatible goggles, you can teleport freely around your apartment, and when tapping the screen you can touch Yui and some of the items in your room!

*If your goggles are not Samukon compatible, moving around the apartment will happen with a predetermined warp. You will also not be able to “Action” as much.

-System Requirements
Position tracking is only available with iPhone 6s and later models.
Hand tracking is only available with iPhone 7 and later models.

-Error Reports/Inquiries-
Please search for “Gugenka” and use the inquiry form on our official site.

Sales Agency: Gugenka from CS-REPORTERS.INC
